string-array.name: badTips
string-array.item: Did they spit in your food?
Was her belly touching your face
she didn\'t apologize for her smell

string-array.name: goodTips
string-array.item: good food must have made up for the poor service
Just another meal but she is saving for college
A for effort but F for that body

string-array.name: greatTips
string-array.item: she "accidentally" spilled water all over her
Good job on getting her digits!
